mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_price, goods_uptime, goods_description, goods_paypeople, goods_color, goods_size, goods_num, goods_purchasetime, secondclassify_id, ` goods_logo`
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_name, goods_price, goods_uptime, goods_description, goods_paypeople, goods_color, goods_size, goods_num, goods_purchasetime, secondclassify_id, ` goods_logo`) values (#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPaypeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPurchasetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondclassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into goods
goods_name,
goods_price,
goods_uptime,
goods_description,
goods_paypeople,
goods_color,
goods_size,
goods_num,
goods_purchasetime,
secondclassify_id,
` goods_logo`,

mapper.update:
update goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_uptime = #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_description = #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_paypeople = #{goodsPaypeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_color = #{goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_size = #{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_purchasetime = #{goodsPurchasetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secondclassify_id = #{secondclassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
` goods_logo` = #{goodsLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_uptime = #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_description = #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_paypeople = #{goodsPaypeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_color = #{goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_size = #{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_purchasetime = #{goodsPurchasetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secondclassify_id = #{secondclassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ` goods_logo` = #{goodsLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from goods order by goods_purchasetime desc limit 0,4
select * from goods order by goods_uptime desc limit 0,4
select * from goods order by rand() limit 16
select * from goods g join secondclassify s join sumclassify s2 on g.secondclassify_id = s.secondclassify_id and s.sumclassify_id=s2.sumclassify_id where s.sumclassify_id=#{sumclassifyId}
